trans-unit.source: This class is used to generate a database query method signature, as it will be created by the typed dataset generator.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodSignatureGenerator" name="MethodSignatureGenerator" href=""></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> object.

The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> object, which provides code generation and code compilation interfaces for generating code and managing compilation for a single programming language.
Code generators can be used to generate code in a particular language, and code compilers can be used to compile code into assemblies.
Gets or sets the type of object that the query will fill.
The type of object that the query will fill.
The type will be either <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
Gets or sets the type name of the typed dataset to be filled.
A string representing the type name of the typed dataset to be filled.
Returns the code member method representing the database query, as generated by the typed dataset generator.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod"></xref> object representing the database query, as generated by the typed dataset generator.
Returns a string representing the database query method signature, as generated by the typed dataset generator.
A string representing the database query method signature, as generated by the typed dataset generator.
Returns a code type declaration containing the Insert, Update, and Delete methods associated with the database query.

A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> object containing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Insert" name="Insert" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Delete" name="Delete" href=""></xref> methods associated with the database query.
Gets or sets a Boolean value specifying whether the signature generated needs to return a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object.

A Boolean value specifying whether the signature generated needs to return a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the signature generated needs to return a data table, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a Boolean value specifying whether the method supports paging.

A Boolean value specifying whether the method supports paging: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the method supports paging; <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> if it does not.
Gets or sets the category of types to use for parameters.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Design.ParameterGenerationOption>.

A <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParameterGenerationOption" name="ParameterGenerationOption" href=""></xref> value specifying the category of types to use for parameters: <xref href="System.Data.Design.ParameterGenerationOption"></xref> (the default), <xref href="System.Data.Design.ParameterGenerationOption"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Data.Design.ParameterGenerationOption"></xref>.
Sets the schema of the design table for which the database query method will be generated.
A string representation of the table schema.
Sets the database query for which the method signature will be generated.
A string representation of the database query.
Gets or sets the type name of the typed table to fill.
A string indicating the type name of the typed table to fill.
